overview: Exploring the notions of body image and sexual expression as they intersect with family and society, this short interweaves three narratives: first, a "naked fugitive on the loose" as she runs, walks and leaves traces of her "alien" existence throughout the city; second, a butch lesbian persona who is the naked woman's secret cohort; and third, a young girl who is just understanding her own sexuality.
title: Bodily Functions
